verses.roman:
ānandita śivānanda kare samādhāna
ācāryādi-vaiṣṇavere dilā vāsā-sthāna

synonyms: ānandita—pleased; śivānanda—Śivānanda Sena; kare samādhāna—began to arrange things; ācārya-ādi-vaiṣṇavere—unto all the Vaiṣṇavas, headed by Advaita Ācārya; dilā—gave; vāsā-sthāna—residential places.
translation: Being very pleased by Nityānanda Prabhu's behavior, Śivānanda Sena began to arrange residential quarters for all the Vaiṣṇavas, headed by Advaita Ācārya.
